item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde! Do you love French language and culture? For this meeting, bring a few nice photos, if you have them, of your summer vacation. Be prepared to present them en fran√ßais! Topics of past meetups have included travel, music, politics, and other topics! For this meetup, I have invited some honors students at the local high school. They can earn extra credit if they come!
Il ya beaucoup de gens who want to practice speaking French. They would like to parler avec vous! Venez for coffee and patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month. at 7PM.
Bienvenue!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French September Meetups
